content: {"name": "Citrus County Family Resource Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Clients can visit once every 8 weeks ", "email": "", "url": "https://ccfrc.org/Index2.html", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "3660 North Carl G Rose Highway", "address_2": null, "city": "Hernando", "state_province": "FL", "postal_code": "34442", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 28.9163901, "longitude": -82.3763354}, "phones": [{"number": "(352) 344-1001", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Requires ID for adults and birth certificates for children in the household"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}]}
